item.title: Virtual safe haven? Bitcoin surges to highest in more than two years - The Economic Times
item.description:
Virtual safe haven? Bitcoin surges to highest in more than two years - The Economic Times

LONDON: The price of bitcoin surged 8 percent to $750 on Thursday, its highest since early 2014, as jittery investors sought shelter in the web-based currency, once considered too volatile to invest in, let alone at times of market stress.

item.title: Bitcoin is being Bitcoin and spiking 30% this week and 200% this year
item.description:
Bitcoin is being Bitcoin and spiking 30% this week and 200% this year

It feels like we only hear about Bitcoin when the price is either tanking or skyrocketing. And, since it's currently skyrocketing, let's talk about Bitcoin! As of writing, Bitcoin is hovering around $745 per coin. It has only been worth this much twice before - once on the way up to the height of the Christmas 2013 bubble, and once on the way down.

item.title: This is Only a Test: Bank of Canada Comments on CAD-Coin Blockchain Trial - CoinDesk
item.description:
This is Only a Test: Bank of Canada Comments on CAD-Coin Blockchain Trial - CoinDesk

Canada's central bank unveiled a blockchain-based interbank payment experiment earlier this week, a move the institution said in new statements isn't intended to launch a new e-money system. When reached for comment, Central Bank of Canada senior deputy governor Carolyn Wilkins said that the 'CAD-coin' project was intended "solely to better understand the technology first-hand".

item.title: Bank of Canada studies payments system using tech behind bitcoin
item.description:
Bank of Canada studies payments system using tech behind bitcoin

TORONTO/OTTAWA The Bank of Canada is experimenting with a payments system based on the technology behind the bitcoin virtual currency, the central bank said on Thursday. Bank of Canada Senior Deputy Governor Carolyn Wilkins said the central bank has been working with commercial banks to build the experimental interbank payment system.

item.title: Caricoin debuts bitcoin mobile wallet in Caribbean
item.description:
Caricoin debuts bitcoin mobile wallet in Caribbean

Caricoin Ltd. announced Thursday the launch of what it calls "the mobile wallet of the Caribbean." Based in the UK with development offices in Jamaica, Caricoin said in a press release it's offerin...

item.title: Bank of Canada testing digital fiat dollar
item.description:
Bank of Canada testing digital fiat dollar

The Bank of Canada, along with Payments Canada and the Royal Bank of Canada (RBC), said they have been testing a digital fiat currency known as CAD-COIN, reported Forbes. The parties revealed the d...

item.title: Expert View: Applying Blockchain Tech to Artificial Intelligence
item.description:
Expert View: Applying Blockchain Tech to Artificial Intelligence

Distributed ledger technology may be successfully applied to develop artificial intelligence projects, thinks Dr. Maxim Orlovsky, Ukrainian complex systems and neuroscience expert. Speaking at Blockchain Conference Kyiv on may 20, Maxim Orlovsky described the new trends in AI development that became possible after the emergence of new decentralized options for data exchange and storage.

item.title: Agentic Group Blockchain Consortium Expands To France
item.description:
Agentic Group Blockchain Consortium Expands To France

Agentic Group is one of the many companies focusing on blockchain technology. The new York-based global Blockchain Consortium is expanding into Europe, as they opened an office in Paris. Moreover, there will be a special two-day event focusing on blockchain technology in the region.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Lift Off Might Be a Moonshot
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Lift Off Might Be a Moonshot

The price of Bitcoin has broken yet another ceiling today tapping the $775 USD mark on Bitstamp Also read: Trading Bitcoin on the Street: How's LocalBitcoins Doing in 2016? . This has got the community going wild as they are all hoping to repeat the 2013 run again.

item.title: John McAfee-led MGT Capital welcomes bitcoin experts to Cryptocurrency Advisory Board
item.description:
John McAfee-led MGT Capital welcomes bitcoin experts to Cryptocurrency Advisory Board

MGT Capital Investments, newly helmed by cybersecurity guru John McAfee, announced over the course of the week the appointment of prominent members of the bitcoin community to its new Cryptocurrenc...
